document_name: Decision No.417/QD-TTg of the Prime Minister  issuing  the Overall Action Programme for  the implementation  of  Resolution No.120/NQ-CP of the Government on sustainable and climate-resilient development of the Mekong Delta
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/VNM/2019/VNM-2019-04-23-Decision No.417_QD-TTg of the Prime Minister  issuing  the Overall Action Programme for  the implementation  of  Resolution No.120_NQ-CP of the Government on sustainable and climate-resilient development of the Mekong Delta_b705963f47ffe7c231b8bd711c126e2c.pdf
document_description: Decision 417/QD-TTg approves Resolution 120/NQ-CP of November 17th, 2017. It seeks to adopt measures to protect the Mekong Delta from the adverse effects of climate change.
